# Graph.LoadDgml method

Load a DGML file into a new Graph object.

```csharp
public static Graph LoadDgml(string graphFilePath)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| graphFilePath | Full path to the DGML file. |

## Return Value

The loaded Graph object.
